response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which we believe would significantly enhance your business operations and growth. This product, valued at $1,000,000 to you, represents a strategic asset that can potentially revolutionize your industry. Considering its immense value and the benefits it can bring, I am offering you the chance to purchase this product at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is exclusive to you and is designed to ensure that you can maximize the potential returns on your investment. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information about the product's features and capabilities. I look forward to the possibility of working together to achieve your business goals.", "product_price": 950000}
